title: What are some conspiracy theories surrounding the Illuminati? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fake Illuminati theories: -Sniper who assasinated JFK was Illuminati member. -They hired suiciders to crash in 2 towers in 9/11 attack -They started french revolution -All Illuminati members are KKK. -Michael Jackson was Illuminati -Donald Trump is Illuminati Illuminati theories that are true: -They are trying to make religion illegal -A lot of freemasons are Illuminati -They were banned in 1785,however they were reunited in 1788 and they are still active today(confirmed from Weishaupt's diaries) -Adolph Knigge was Illuminati. Unknown theories(not confirmed yet): -Founder Adam Weishaupt is still alive -Obama is Illuminati -Skull and bones are Illuminati
I’m going to recommend you look at the Illuminati topic and pick those that work for you.
